page.title: 19Entertainment Choir Music.
page.content: One cold morning in February 1985, I woke up looking forward to going to the H.T.V.Studios at Cardiff with the Hywel Girls Choir.We arrived at 11.00. We were shown to our dressing rooms and told to be ready by 11.20. Everybody met in the waiting room, and at 11.30 we were taken to the studio where all the lights and cameras were on standby - ready to film us. The director placed us in our positions and we started singing. We had to sing seven songs in Welsh and one in English. When we had finished, it was about 17.30. but we didn't get home until 20.00. When we went to the next choir practice, Mr.Williams (the choir master),said we had sung well,and that we would be on T.V.the next Friday night.
